name: The Lost Dev Team Demo (Updated 05-14-2017)
description:
The Lost Dev Team is a platforming puzzle game, where three game developers have to use their skills to escape a series of game prototypes. It is a collaborative project, and you are certainly welcome to contribute to it, at

github.com/double-fine-game-club/the-lost-dev-team

This is a demo with a placeholder ending that was made for the end of the Amnesia Fortnight 2017. The project is still ongoing, and is completely collaborative. Anyone can submit anything they want, from art to music, to writing, to coding and anything in between. Everything is welcome. :D

Contributors:

See github.com/double-fine-game-club/the-lost-dev-team for an up to date list of contributors and contributions

This game uses the MIT licensed Godot engine. Visit godotengine.org for more information.

AnenomeJennifer McMurrayfleskCheesenesslightsodakyle3wynn
